7 Tou kidi kanna ni-makou-ouzoung tmatæ'æm ki Makou-zazyng poulilyt k'anna ta ti Herodes, ni-mou-nḡara neini-æn ki ki-di ki ni-eu-pænæ'-en ki atta-tallin-gei neini-æn?

8 Ka rou madingi-dingi neini-æn ton Bethlehem, ni k'ma, 'Oudadarang-au maki-pougas kmi'ymalei ki rauwei, ka rou paki-valei-'noumi tateni, lmi-kog-ag'nnau iau-an, alei ka irou-âl-appa-koh deip tyni-æn.

9 Neni k'anna dou ni-tna-kah'ato millingigh ki Mei-sasou ka Si-bavau, ni-d'maran'g atou-ra, Ka k'ytt'ey, ta attatalingei ka ni-ara-rau nein, tæ'ǣ-reia, ni-'t-ourourou'tauqua neini-æn tou kidi-appa k'anna, ka ni-tau-qua rihkau tou vavau ki itou-qu-'an ki rauwei-ra.
10 Irou ka k'yyt'an nein ta attatalingei nda, ni-mar-'ei ta nei-ni ki karai-jen ka ouhang irang.
